data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Logone Occidental that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Logone Occidental, Chad
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 618,600 citizens of Logone Occidental, Chad, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.section_summary: On average, 15 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Logone Occidental, Chad.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Logone Occidental, Chad.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Logone Occidental.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 45,026 believers in Logone Occidental, Chad how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Over 74.46 percent of the people of Logone Occidental are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.section_summary:
the state of Logone Occidental, Chad has a population of 618,600.

We estimate Logone Occidental has 45,026 people who might know Jesus, 112,945 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 460,629 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Logone Occidental, Chad know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.
